wmolevo.name: Workshop on Molecular Evolution
wmolevo.description: Workshop focusing on molecular evolutionary analysis and phylogenetic methods.

wog.name: Workshop on Genomics
wog.description: Annual workshop focusing on genomic data analysis techniques including genome assembly, annotation, alignment, and variant calling.

programm.name: Programming - Python and Biopython
programm.description: Workshop on Programming - Python and Biopython

wpsg.name: Workshop on Population and Speciation Genomics
wpsg.description: Biennial workshop analyzing genomic data at population and species levels.

wphylo.name: Workshop on Phylogenomics
wphylo.description: Workshop on phylogenomic analysis and large-scale evolutionary studies.

wmta.name: Workshop on Microbiome and Transcriptome Analysis
wmta.description: Workshop focusing on microbiome and transcriptomic analysis methods.
